thread.title: Watch first lady Melania Trump announce her White House policy goals

author: Jacob Pramuk
title: Watch first lady Melania Trump announce her White House policy goals
text:
Watch Melania Trump announce her policy goals as first lady 1 Hour Ago CNBC.com
[The stream is slated to start at 3 p.m. ET. Please refresh the page if you do not see a player above at that time.]
First lady Melania Trump will announce her policy platform on Monday afternoon.
Presidents' spouses have typically chosen issues on which to focus during their time in the White House.
Trump appears set to focus on priorities related to children. CNBC NEWSLETTERS
